description:
Creates a new VPN service from git hosted template, and publishes to git release repository (customer)
---
1. do this
2. do that
3. do the other thing
4. use this ip 10.11.12.23
5. generate traffic on this interface
name: CNC - L3 Service [Service Designer] (step 2) new L3 VPN service

options.description: > Git repository that maintains the VPN templates, policies and ODNs
options.label: Template Respository
options.name: repo

options.description: > VLAN from Netbox Pool using `customer` tag
options.label: CE VLAN
options.name: vlan-id

options.description: > Auto allocation from Pool for IP Addressing using Netbox
options.name: ipv4-addressing

commands.description: retrieve file names of Template and Policy

commands.script:
nodelist=$(echo '@option.device@' | jq -cR 'split(",")')

# Create node variables data.ne-1*
echo $nodelist | jq -r '.[0] | "ne-id-1="+.'
echo $nodelist | jq -r '.[1] | "ne-id-2="+.'
echo $nodelist | jq -r '.[2] | "ne-id-3="+.'

# Create VPN variables
echo vpn-id=@option.vpn-name@

# Create VLAN vpn-id
echo cvlan-id=@export.vlanid@

# Create IP Addresses 
echo provider-address-1=@export.ip-1@
echo provider-address-2=@export.ip-2@
echo provider-address-3=@export.ip-3@

# Create Peer AS 
echo peer-autonomous-system=@option.peer-as@

file=/opt/cw/tmp/@job.execid@-servicedesign.json
res=$(jq -c '.' $file)
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[0]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[].id="@data.ne-id-1*@-@data.vpn-id*@"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[1]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[].id="@data.ne-id-2*@-@data.vpn-id*@"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[2]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[].id="@data.ne-id-3*@-@data.vpn-id*@"')

res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[0]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses".address[]."address-id"="@data.ne-id-1*@-@data.cvlan-id*@-ipv4-address"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[1]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses".address[]."address-id"="@data.ne-id-2*@-@data.cvlan-id*@-ipv4-address"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[2]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses".address[]."address-id"="@data.ne-id-3*@-@data.cvlan-id*@-ipv4-address"')

res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[0]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses".address[]."provider-address"="@data.provider-address-1*@"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[1]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses".address[]."provider-address"="@data.provider-address-2*@"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[2]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses".address[]."provider-address"="@data.provider-address-3*@"')

res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[0]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses"."primary-address"="@data.ne-id-1*@-@data.cvlan-id*@-ipv4-address"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[1]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses"."primary-address"="@data.ne-id-2*@-@data.cvlan-id*@-ipv4-address"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[2]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."ip-connection".ipv4."static-addresses"."primary-address"="@data.ne-id-3*@-@data.cvlan-id*@-ipv4-address"')

# Update AS 

res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[0]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."routing-protocols"."routing-protocol"[].bgp."peer-autonomous-system"=@data.peer-autonomous-system*@')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[1]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."routing-protocols"."routing-protocol"[].bgp."peer-autonomous-system"=@data.peer-autonomous-system*@')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[2]."vpn-network-accesses"."vpn-network-access"[]."routing-protocols"."routing-protocol"[].bgp."peer-autonomous-system"=@data.peer-autonomous-system*@')

res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("node-ie-profile")))."node-ie-profile"="@data.vpn-id*@-profile"')

res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("cvlan-id")))."cvlan-id"=@data.cvlan-id*@')
res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("vpn-id")))."vpn-id"="@option.customer@-@data.vpn-id*@"')

res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("ie-profile-id")))."ie-profile-id"="@data.vpn-id*@-profile"')
#res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("export-policy")))."export-policy"="@data.vpn-id*@-route-policy"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("export-policy")))."export-policy"="@data.policy-name*@"')

res=$(echo $res | jq '(..|objects|select(has("rd")))."rd"="0:@data.peer-autonomous-system*@:@data.cvlan-id*@"')


res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[0]."ne-id"="@data.ne-id-1*@"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[1]."ne-id"="@data.ne-id-2*@"')
res=$(echo $res | jq '. | .[][][]."vpn-nodes"."vpn-node"[2]."ne-id"="@data.ne-id-3*@"')

echo $res | jq -c .
echo $res | jq . > /opt/cw/tmp/@job.execid@-new-service.json
